title: Integrations
lede: Connect iMash with your existing business tools and software platforms.

sections.title: Available Integrations
sections.content:
Connect with popular business tools and platforms.

Integration Categories:

  • CRM Systems: Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive
  • Communication: Slack, Microsoft Teams, Discord
  • Marketing: Mailchimp, Constant Contact, ActiveCampaign
  • Analytics: Google Analytics, Mixpanel, Segment

sections.title: Integration Setup
sections.content:
Set up and configure integrations with your business tools.

  • OAuth Authentication: Secure connection setup
  • Field Mapping: Map data between systems
  • Sync Configuration: Real-time or scheduled data sync
  • Integration Monitoring: Track sync status and errors
